title: Introduction to Gen AI
content: This presentation will provide an overview of generative artificial intelligence (Gen AI) and its applications.

title: What is Gen AI?
content: Gen AI refers to a class of AI models that can generate new content, such as text, images, or audio, based on input data or prompts.

title: Applications of Gen AI
content: Gen AI can be used for a variety of applications, including content creation, language modeling, image generation, and more.

title: Challenges and Limitations
content: While Gen AI offers many benefits, it also comes with challenges, such as bias, safety, and ethical concerns.

title: The Future of Gen AI
content: As Gen AI technology continues to evolve, it will likely have a significant impact on various industries and sectors.
